name: MPSCNNCrossChannelNormalization
desc: A normalization kernel applied across feature channels.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder, device: MTLDevice)
items.desc: Initializes a normalization kernel in a channel.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, kernelSize: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a normalization kernel in a channel.

items.name: var alpha: Float
items.desc: The "alpha" variable of the kernel function.

items.name: var beta: Float
items.desc: The "beta" variable of the kernel function.

items.name: var delta: Float
items.desc: The "delta" variable of the kernel function.

items.name: var kernelSize: Int
items.desc: The size of the square kernel window.
